We are seeking a motivated and detail-oriented public relations intern to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will assist the Principal and Account Coordinator with day-to-day tasks related to print and digital media.

About us
Always on the pulse of cultural zeitgeist, and with a deep understanding of today’s media and communications landscape, we tell stories that others cannot.

Lapitino Communications excels at crafting narratives and devising strategies that deliver our clients blockbuster results across print, digital, and broadcast outlets.

With a 360-degree marketing approach to building and managing brands, including securing feature stories in prestigious publications, developing disruptive collaborations that generate massive digital awareness, and executing compelling events—we know how to achieve global recognition for our clients.

Role Overview
We are seeking a motivated and detail-oriented public relations intern to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will assist the Principal and Account Coordinator with day-to-day tasks related to print and digital media.

Key Responsibilities
● Facilitate and assist loans for photoshoot, celebrity, and stylist requests
● Manage and track inventory, including loans and returns
● Monitor, clip, and organize press coverage for clients
● Complete monthly reporting recaps for clients
● Press list management
● Perform administrative tasks as needed

Qualifications
● Proficient in Microsoft and Google Suites
● Highly organized self-starter with the ability to multi-task effectively
● Strong attention to detail
● Excellent written and verbal communication skills
● Proven project management abilities
● Positive attitude, discreet and professional manner
● Ability to work in a fast-paced environment

Additional Details
● Availability to work in-office minimum 2 days per week
● Must be eligible to receive school credit
● The role reports directly to our Account Coordinator

We are looking for someone to start immediately and/or interns for Summer 2025 (May-August)

To Apply
Please submit your resume and cover letter for consideration to Emily@LapitinoCommunications.com.
